an5.4:1.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.4:1.3: It’s when a mendicant is faithless, shameless, imprudent, lazy, and witless.
an5.4:1.4: A mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.4:2.1: A mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.4:2.3: It’s when a mendicant is faithful, conscientious, prudent, energetic, and wise.
an5.4:2.4: A mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
